Verifies resource type returned by the protocol when a fetch() or XHR is redirected

Fetching /inspector-protocol/resources/redirect1.php
Response Received
  url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/final.html
  type: Fetch

Making XHR for /inspector-protocol/resources/redirect1.php
Response Received
  url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/final.html
  type: XHR

Fetching /inspector-protocol/resources/redirect2.php
Response Received
  url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/final.html
  type: Fetch

Making XHR for /inspector-protocol/resources/redirect2.php
Response Received
  url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/final.html
  type: XHR

Fetching /inspector-protocol/resources/final.php
Response Received
  url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/final.php
  type: Fetch

Making XHR for /inspector-protocol/resources/final.php
Response Received
  url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/final.php
  type: XHR
